name: 11 Elements
description:
In this new game you will run through a 3D mystical world filled with trouble and obstacles.
While playing, you'll be jumping over obstacles and attempting to beat your top score. Watch out, because sometimes things aren't quite what they seem... When you enter into the blue fields your character will clone. Sometimes this can help, but it can also be a lot to juggle!

Features in Elements include:

→ Procedurally generated world with heaps of unique challenging levels.
→ Rapid and simple one touch game-play suitable for all ages!

How to play:

1. Tap the screen to jump over obstacles.
2. Double tap to jump higher.
